org.fcrepo.transform

Interface Transformation<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Function<com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Dataset,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LDPathTransform, SparqlQueryTransform

    public interface Transformation<T>
extends com.google.common.base.Function<com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Dataset,T>
    Generic interface for transforming a resource's property dataset to an implementation-defined type

    cbeer
